ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Robert F. Ferguson ** RETIREMENT AND ANNUITY **
PrecisRetirement and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. ROBERT F. FERGUSON, a Judge of the Supreme Court of Nova Scotia (Family Division), effective October 6, 2012.
AttachmentsAttachment
